author: psmith
msg: Started adding a Swing client for general searching.  The command-line editor is simply not up to scratch and is unlikely to be
useful enough, so is temporarily on hold for now.
Refactored some general search logic into a Connection interface.  This will enable a simple remote Connection implementation
later to enable remote searching; it also generally cleans up the API.
Improved some graph extraction logic to look for time based data from events.
